name: 4 in a Row Multiplayer: Slide dot & Epic tribes in brakes online game
name_original: 4 in a Row Multiplayer: Slide dot & Epic tribes in brakes online game
description: The popular all-time classic “4 in a Row MultiPlayer” in the to-go edition as a free app for your smart phone. Play against your friends, beat the computer or look for opponents from around the world to see who has the better tactics or strategy to win the game. In “4 in a Row” the players take turns dropping colored discs into a grid. The aim of the game is to connect a row of four of one’s own colour, either vertically, horizontally or diagonally.
